venue.name: The Kinsale Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Let's meetup for another Kinsale happy trivia hour.
If you're interested in joining a team...please answer the question after you RSVP.

Before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet up with a few drinking buddies at Kinsale in Government Center for a minute or two or three or four or more...however long you're able.

Check out http://www.mbta.com/... or http://www.hopstop.co... to create your route by public transit. Government Center (blue & green lines), State (orange & blue lines), Aquarium (blue line) and South Station (red line & commuter rail). These subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

If you come thirsty here's the beverage menu and/or hungry here's the food menu
Isabelle highly recommends Kinsale's tasty tater tots while I think their reuben is the best around.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

Put the insignificant information in your head to use in the trivia contest, which begins at 6:30 and ends at 8:30. Science, Pop Culture, Current Events, Music, History, Geography, Literature, Sports, TV, Art, Business, & Movies are some common categories.

Stump! Trivia rules:

1) To be eligible for prizes, teams are limited to six players. Be aware, teams with less than six players and have one of the top three scores, win first or second place.

2) The trivia jockey (TJ) provides Stump! sheets, on which to keep your team score. Write the categories as the TJ reads them, and keep track of the points you've wagered.

3) When the TJ asks a question, you have one song to write your team name, your answer, and your wager on an answer ticket and hand it in. You can wager 1, 3, 5, or 7 points in the first two quarters, and 2, 4, 6, or 8 points in the last two quarters. You can only use each value ONCE per quarter.

4) There are three bonus rounds where you can earn lots of extra points! Your TJ will explain how they work.

5) No shouting out answers, and absolutely no using cellphones or other devices to look up answers!
Teams breaking this rule are disqualified.


6) Have fun and good luck.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Meetup seats
item.name: Kinsale Happy Hour on Wednesday September 1st, 2010
